description:
Hizuru and Karikiri face off. Gil and Rose join the skirmish, making the battle deadlier. Meanwhile, Shinpei and Ushio`s shadow head to other Karikiri locations. Mio`s shadow kills Shidehiko without hesitation and traces the shadow to Kotoko. With her dying breath, Kotoko tells Mio`s shadow to find Hizuru and the others.
Source: Disney+

titles.title: (Erstens) kommt es anders, (und zweitens) als man denkt
